sources.title: Big House Blues (1990)
sources.description: Ren and Stimpy, on the streets starving, are captured by the dog catcher. They end up in the pound and become frightened when one of the dogs tells them of the "big sleep". Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/big-house-blues-1990/

metadata.Plot: Ren and Stimpy, on the streets starving, are captured by the dog catcher. They end up in the pound and become frightened when one of the dogs tells them of the "big sleep".
metadata.Writer: John Kricfalusi, Bob Camp, Lynne Naylor
metadata.Actors: Henry Porch, Bob Camp, Jim Smith
